title: What are the lyrics of the new Bollywood song 'Tu Jo Mili' from the hacked movie sung by Yasser Desai? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tu jo mili lyrics from Hacked movie singer is Yasser Desai and composer is Jeet Gannguli and Lyricist is Shakeel Azmi, Guitar - Ankur Mukherjee.
